rules.description: Disable all keys when keyboard is locked
Lock keyboard with Cmd+Shift+Ctrl+Opt+Fn+L (if not already locked)
Open Web Inspection with Command+Option+I in Typora

manipulators.description: Return to return if pressed alone and control if held down

rules.description: (Vim 1/11) caps_lock -> on, caps_lock, esc, control+[ or any pointing_button -> off
(Vim 2/11) finger on trackpad + any key -> off

manipulators.description: Caps Lock to Escape if pressed and Command+Control+Option+Shift if held down

rules.description: Fn+F for Fullscreen in specific apps
Custom key remappings for US Layout with 'compose key'
Command+G to open Google in Firefox
Backslash to Shift + Forward Slash (quick find)
F6 for Focus mode, Sleep and Shut Down
Fn+F1 and Fn+F2 for Keyboard Brightness
Disable all keys when keyboard is locked
Disable all keys when keyboard is locked
Lock keyboard with Cmd+Shift+Ctrl+Opt+Fn+L (if not already locked)
Caps Lock to Escape if pressed and Command+Control+Option+Shift if held down
